io.spine.server.entity

Interface RepositoryView<I,E extends Entity<I,?>>

  • Type Parameters:
    I - the type of IDs of entities returned by the view
    E - the entity type
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AggregatePartRepository, AggregateRepository, CommandLifecycleRepository, DefaultRecordBasedRepository, EntityHistoryRepository, EventDispatchingRepository, ProcessManagerRepository, ProjectionRepository, RecordBasedRepository, Repository, TenantRepository

    public interface RepositoryView<I,E extends Entity<I,?>>
    A view on a repository.

    A Repository may have a view that provides a different set of entities. For example, there can be views that represent archived or deleted entities (that are not "visible" by default).

    Repository itself is also a RepositoryView, which loads only "visible" entities.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.Optional<E> find(I id)
      Finds an entity with the passed ID.
      java.util.Iterator<E> iterator(com.google.common.base.Predicate<E> filter)
      Returns an iterator over the entities exposed by the view that match the passed filter.

    • Method Detail

      • find

        java.util.Optional<E> find(I id)
        Finds an entity with the passed ID.
        Parameters:
        id - the ID of the entity to load
        Returns:
        the entity or Optional.empty() if there's no entity with such ID

      • iterator

        java.util.Iterator<E> iterator(com.google.common.base.Predicate<E> filter)
        Returns an iterator over the entities exposed by the view that match the passed filter.
        Parameters:
        filter - the filtering predicate
        Returns:
        new iterator
